result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Keenan T Knight

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Keenan T Knight not in court, in custody.  Attorney Colin Patrick McGinn in court by video for Keenan T Knight.  Attorney Francesco Mineo in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Parties requested an adjourned status date. Cases may resolve globally. Court grants request. Case remains calendared in Branch 11. 
Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Keenan T Knight not in court, in custody.  Attorney Colin Patrick McGinn in court for Keenan T Knight.  Attorney Francesco Mineo in court on behalf of Patrick J Anderson for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Extradition status. Defendant's appearance is waived. Parties requests a status conference date.  Court adjourns matter for a status conference. Case remains calendared in Branch 11.
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Keenan T Knight in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Keenan T Knight in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Keenan T Knight appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Swanson, Branch 11.  Court reviewed Criminal Complaint and found probable cause. Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus. Court found the Defendant is the person wanted in the State of Illinois. Defendant WAIVED Extradition and signed Waiver. Court ordered the Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department. At request of defense attorney status conference to be held in trial court. Status conference scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Keenan T Knight in court with attorney Sylvan Jaspen.  Defendant Keenan T Knight in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Keenan T Knight appeared by video means with Attorney. Case passed till August 5, 2022 pending issuance of amended compliant.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
